General.Name: Powercom Co Ltd
General.Description: Powercom Co., Ltd provides power solution in Taiwan and internationally. It offers online and offline uninterruptible power supply (UPS), three phase UPS, line-interactive UPS, functional UPS, accessories, auto voltage regulator, inverter, and other products. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 246, Lian Cheng Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan
